snippet.title: The Transformations of the Badass - Hellmut: The Badass from Hell
snippet.description:
HELL MUTant Introduces the first three Transformations - Rat King, Stitchmonster and Construct - in this beyond madness craziness... 

Behold the mighty Badass!

Steam gamepage:
